info.name: Logotournament Dark Theme for Power Designers
info.description:
Logotournament Dark Theme .... this theme changes the UI into Dark grey background ... 
easy on eyes

Just Install "Stylish" plugin in Browser and enjoy this beautiful Dark theme
info.additionalInfo:
This is NOT an official release.

The theme is for designers who are working day and night. Saving their Eyes is the Main purpose of this theme.

Most of the unused parts are removed for pro designers.
